|==============================================================|
| INVENTORY TWEAKS Mod - By Jimeo Wan (jimeo.wan at gmail.com) |
| Readme                                                       |
|==============================================================|

====== [ SETUP ] ======

1. Make sure ModLoader is already installed (http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/75440-)
2. Remove any previous version of Inventory Tweaks
3. Put the Zip in the "mods" folder of Minecraft [OR] Put all of the Zip contents in "minecraft.jar"
4. Launch the game!

======= [ USE ] =======

* Default sorting key is R, but you can map it in the Options menu. The middle click also works.
* At first launch, two configuration files will appear in the minecraft "config" folder. Open them to learn how to customize the mod!

====== [ LINKS ] ======

* Minecraft Forum thread: http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/323444-
* Official website: http://wan.ka.free.fr/?invtweaks
* Source code: https://github.com/jimeowan/inventory-tweaks
